name: react-with-direction
description: Components to provide and consume RTL or LTR direction in React
author: Yaniv Zimet <yaniv.zimet@airbnb.com>

scripts.react:clean: npm uninstall --no-save react react-dom react-test-renderer react-addons-test-utils enzyme-adapter-react-14 enzyme-adapter-react-15.4 enzyme-adapter-react-15 enzyme-adapter-react-16 && rimraf node_modules/react-test-renderer node_modules/react && npm prune
scripts.react:14: npm run react:clean && npm i --no-save react@0.14 react-dom@0.14 react-addons-test-utils@0.14 enzyme-adapter-react-14 && npm prune && npm i --no-save react-addons-test-utils@0.14 enzyme-adapter-react-14
scripts.react:15.4: npm run react:clean && npm i --no-save react@15.4 react-dom@15.4 react-addons-test-utils@15.4 enzyme-adapter-react-15.4 react-test-renderer@15.4 && npm prune && npm i --no-save react-addons-test-utils@15.4 enzyme-adapter-react-15.4
scripts.react:15: npm run react:clean && npm i --no-save react@15 react-dom@15 react-test-renderer@15 react-addons-test-utils@15 enzyme-adapter-react-15 && npm prune && npm i --no-save react-addons-test-utils@15 enzyme-adapter-react-15
scripts.react:16: npm run react:clean && npm i --no-save react@16 react-dom@16 react-test-renderer@16 enzyme-adapter-react-16 && npm prune && npm i --no-save enzyme-adapter-react-16
